alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 15 at 4:57PM EST until December 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST /10 AM EST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Grundy, Southern Cook, Northern Will, Southern Will and Eastern Will Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A line of showers and thunderstorms may result in a short period of even higher wind gusts late this evening, mainly west of Interstate 55. Be alert for severe thunderstorm warnings. Secure any outdoor decorations and lighter outdoor furniture. Use caution when driving in windy conditions, especially on interstates and open roads.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
